Wyll Approval Guide in BG3

Normally, players will need to make conversation and do the right actions to gain approval with their companions however, it is a bit tricky with Wyll. He is noble and admires when players chooses to be heroic, lending a helping hand as well as going against selfishness, entitled behavior, and never siding with monsters such as Devils, and Goblins.
